name: Innovate CV
tag_list: human-resources, hospitality, restaurant, food-and-services, recruitment, mobile, technology, user-experience, candidate-experience
overview:
Innovate CV is an industry leading provider of talent acquisition software and services. The company mission is to transform the application process and to use technology to put people at the forefront of human resources. Innovate CV achieves this mission through several products, including a applicant management tool and an innovative mobile application tool.

The customizable Innovate CV solution is intuitive, web-based, mobile-optimized, and meets the needs of a multitude of businesses.
